page.title: 16ENTERTAINMENT IN BORDON
page.content: Barbados House is the centre of entertainment in Bordon. Activities here include:_ a playgroup; pop mobility coffee mornings; karate theatre; children's drama tap dancing (for young and old) art groups; car boot sales. The only cinema in Bordon closed down in 1983. It became a bingo hall but that too will soon close. However Barbados House intends to show films and soon will show 4 films_ "Time Bandits", "BMX Bandits", "Alice in Wonderland", and "Two of a Kind". The area boasts one pub, "The Red Lion" at Oakhanger and two cafes.
